item.title: Bitcoin outflows from centralized exchanges surge to 100K BTC monthly
item.dc:creator: Martin Young
item.description: Centralized exchanges have experienced their heaviest week of Bitcoin withdrawals since November 2020.

item.title: Brad Garlinghouse's lawyers file request for Binance documents in 'international' challenge to SEC lawsuit

item.title: Price analysis 8/2: BTC, ETH, BNB, ADA, XRP, DOGE, DOT, UNI, BCH, LINK
item.dc:creator: Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin price has hit a few barriers but many altcoins appear positioned for continuation.

item.title: OpenSea's daily volume is exceeding its 2020 total
item.dc:creator: Brian Quarmby
item.description: Nonfungible tokens appear to be bubbling again, with marketplace OpenSea now processing more volume daily than it did for the entirety of 2020.
